website_summaries.verdict: The best budget-friendly way to have a healthy supply of formula dispensers for emergencies.
pros: Comes with six individual formula dispensers, each BPA and phthalate-free for safe consumption
Can also carry dry powder or a combination of wet and dry formula
cons: Multiple individual dispensers take up more room than dispensers with an internal divider

customer_reviews.title: Easy transport
customer_reviews.text: Great item for transporting formula. I use these for daycare so all they have to do is pour it in the bottle because it has the right amount placed in the cup. I gave it a 4 because the box says can hold up to 8 scoops. They have to mean 8oz Bc you can only get 4 scoops in and that's pushing it so they should correct the boxes Bc it is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Dominica McLendon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with Kiinde pouch!
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT! and not just for TT brand. I mostly feed with the Kiinde system and although I have the funnel I needed something quicker and more streamlined. This solved that problem. The spout fits perfectly into the Kiinde pouch opening!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Purifoy

customer_reviews.title: Buy these. They're worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Like an idiot, before I got these I carted a jar of formula around in my diaper bag. I often spilled formula trying to measure out scoops while juggling a baby. Now, I prep a couple bottles with these bad boys and always have them on hand and ready to assemble, without the hassle of trying to measure on-the-go. Sweet sweet victory! Plus, they're great for having bottles prepped for family or babysitters.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand alone product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these with the tommee tippee bottles, but baby didn't like those. So I ended up using these alone for carrying formula powder. I have been very impressed. The caps don't screw or snap, so one would think they would come off and spill everything everywhere inside your diaper bag if they aren't inside a bottle. But after 6 months that has never happened! Love the funnel design that makes it easy on me and babysitters. I can easily make bottles with one hand because of these!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy & convenient!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect formula containers! We prefer these over the munchkin three compartment containers. We use these with Dr. Browns bottles (not to sit in the bottle though). We just toss these in our diaper bag along with a bottle containing water and we are set for the day! They're also perfect at home to leave out for our nanny so it's not another hand reaching in the formula canister. Super easy to pour in bottle, no formula sticks to sides, very easy to clean in dishwasher and then sterilize.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: After a year, the nipples have torn
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way the bottle felt and how flexible and soft it was. It also fits nicely into most cupholders. Note that the bottom is rounded, however, and doesn't sit well on a flat surface. I found the bottle overall nice, but with some issues given the price, and it's not very durable. I bought Tommee Tippee and Avent bottles around the same time as these, and both of those have held up, but the como tomo bottle clearly has a tear in the nipple, so it leaks, but more importantly if my daughter were to bite through it a bit more, she could end up choking on the plastic/silicone.
customer_reviews.author: WangATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this in a newborn stage. It’s a sturdy plastic and easy to use once you get hang of it. I need few time to explore to open the lid instead of taking a hole top part out. We use the dr. Brown narrow neck bottle. I had so much hard time to add formula into that small opening. This helped me to pour the formula in a narrow opening. Only downside is it doesn’t hold more then 5-6 scoops of German formula we using. However it will be a great tool to use from newborn till 5-6months till your baby drinks 5-6oz milk at a time.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: A must have for formula feeding parents!!
customer_reviews.text: These are such an amazing little thing to have that made our lives so much easier! So many applications for pre-portioned formula containers! We left these upstairs in the nursery so we wouldn't have to go downstairs at 2am for formula. Left them out on the counter ready to go when a family member was watching baby for us, took the guessing out of how much to put in a bottle. Took them in the diaper bag so we weren't measuring out formula or worrying about keeping a bottle cold while out with friends. We did not have the matching bottle set they fit into for easy travel storage, but clearly, still used almost daily for the first year.
customer_reviews.author: Astro21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for diaper bag travel and over night feedings. They hold 4 9g scoops for 8oz of water = 8oz of milk. They fit right inside the Tommee Tippee bottles. When going out, I can fill with 8oz of water and put the dispenser inside the bottle and close the lid. No leaking and everything's ready to go. For night time, I have a small basket beside the bed and keep them in there so it's pre measured. Easiest way to get the top off is removing the little lid, then sticking your finger down the hole, making a hook shape and lifting up.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: They work but not to perfection
customer_reviews.text: PROS: * Fits about 3-4 scoops of formula (4 scoops is pushing it however) * Great for traveling and convenient! CONS: * Once your baby is drinking 8 oz. these containers have a very hard time fitting 4 scoops of formula. * I didn't find that clipping them inside the Tommee Tippee bottles was useful. I just filled up bottles with water and put formula in the containers without snapping them inside. You can't have a bottle with water and snap these inside without spillage, unless you only have 2 oz. of water. * SUPER loud when getting out formula into bottle
customer_reviews.author: Sarrowind

customer_reviews.title: Comvenient
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, easy to pour, and very helpful for nighttime feedings to make things quicker. However they are only useful up to about 4 ounces (2 scoops) of formula. Once my son moved up to drinking 6 ounces I could not fit the formula powder into these cups anymore they are way too small. So while they are super useful for up to 4 ounces once you pass 4 ounces you will have to find something else. I was hopeful that I could use them long-term because I loved them so much but had to give them to a friend once we reach to 6 ounces (3 scoops) of formula.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Tussing

customer_reviews.title: Best formula dispenser EVERRRR!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! I purchased these on sale & then went back to buy 2 more sets at full price. They make it so easy when traveling with a baby & daycare loves these because it is very obvious on how much formula goes with the amount of water put into the bottles. If you are a freak like me & worry about people not giving your baby the right ratio of formula:water this is a LIFESAVER!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Smart Idea
customer_reviews.text: I love these for portioning out formula as it eliminates the need to prepare the formula ahead of time or take a whole container with us. They also fit nicely down inside the tommee tippee bottles so make bottle prep easy and compact. I have also used them to portion out baby cereal and take it on the go. Per the instructions they are single use only and not to be washed. Unfortunately, despite their convenience, I can't justify the cost in purchasing them in the quantity that I would need moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Wright

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the tommee tippee bottles. We carry a bottle with powder around in her diaper bag for an extra “just in case”. I rotate it out once a month. Recently had to do a trip with my 6 week old and stayed in a hotel. I would prefil these for the day throw them in bottles and into her diaper bag. I grabbed a bottle of water and would warm that up then mixed it with the powder. I would then rinse them out at night and repeat the next day
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: These will hold THREE scoops of Enfamil max - I don't know where they got the 8 from. Also, they will not fit in the narrow mouth bottles; wide mouth only. Not a biggie. And the pop-off lids are impossible to remove if you tighten them down so they don't spill when transporting. You have to leave them a bit loose at the risk of them coming off for ease of removable. If you plan to use for transport, I suggest to look elsewhere. We will only use for night feeds and until our child outgrows the three scoop limitation then to the trash they go.
customer_reviews.author: David Solis

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited for these but was a little disappointed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Eh. I was super excited for these but was a little disappointed the first time I used them. There are 3 pieces. Main container, lid with opening and cap for opening. The lid is super hard to get onto container which is good in the respect that it shouldn't pop off but if you put the cap on to help push the lid on then it is impossibly hard to get off without taking off the lid and possibly spilling the contents. Other than this issue these are great and work well. Would still order because still better than what else I have found for formula on the go.
customer_reviews.author: MommaS

customer_reviews.title: Capacity
customer_reviews.text: These are very convenient, however it's says that they can hold up to 8 scoops which is wrong. I use enfamil prosobee and I can barely pack down 3 scoops into them. They haven't fell open in my diaper bag or popped open unexpectedly. Yet they are easy to open with one hand. They do not fit in MAM bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Convenient! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful to have on-the-go! It's convenient to have pre-measured formula amounts and not have to hassle with scooping powder when not at home. They fit perfectly inside the Tommee Tippee bottles. I've only filled them with 3 scoops of powder and the bottles with 6 ounces of water, so unsure how well 4 scoops and 8 oz will fit but it looks like it would be a tight squeeze. I definitely recommend these for when you need to travel with a few feedings on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, terible in middle of night
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to set up bottles for quick mixing during the night. There are too many pieces. It is infuriating at 2 am when you drop the tiny cap and then step on it at the 4 am feeding. Or worse, drop the cap into the bottle you are trying to mix. I really wish the top were one piece, with a flip cap. For travel however, these are great. If you plan on using them during the day only, you can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazone Customare

customer_reviews.title: Great formula dispensers
customer_reviews.text: So glad i found these dispensers, makes life a little easier. Usually fill them up and use them for on the go and night time feedings. They fit in the Tommee Tippee bottles and they also fit in the Mam bottles if you unscrew the bottom. It's nice to have everything pre-measured so that you can save some time making a bottle if your little one is crying. 4 Stars because sometimes when you pull the top off the entire thing will pop out causing some formula spillage.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Tight lids
customer_reviews.text: These are almost “too” good. The top cap stays on super tight which is great for being thrown in a diaper bag but when it’s time to pour the formula out I can’t get just the spout lid off. When you have a screaming baby it seems like an eternity and gets very frustrating. At this point I could of stuck with what I was using before. EDIT- I’m an idiot. If you apparently stay really calm and try to open the cap gently it comes off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Doxielover

customer_reviews.title: Lids snap tight
customer_reviews.text: These formula dispensers are great for middle of the night feedings or on the go. The lids snap very tight and snug. They do not spill even when dropped. They can hold 4 regular size formula scoops although that is the absolute max, 3 scoops is a more comfortable level. Great price though and they fit in the closer to nature tommee tippee bottles perfectly which is an added bonus for on the go.
customer_reviews.author: SereneChaos

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for, Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I like having these around so that I do not have to remeasure and pour. I started off using them to have only 1 scoop, then as my son grew, 2 scoops. Now that hes drinking 6 ounces, I put 3 scoops in there. These are small enough to pack 3-4 in a bottle pocket in a diaper bag but big enough to hold 3 scoops of formula. The caps are nice in that it measures half a scoop of formula. Must buy, get rid of those bulky formula holders and get these instead
customer_reviews.author: J-Koneezy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for travel
customer_reviews.text: These were great for a recent weekend away. Being able to portion out the formula we needed and carry it with us to mix on the go was super easy. In the past we have used other solutions - plastic zip lock bags, other bottles etc but they proved messy or bulky to carry around, whereas these were compact and clean. We just used them to carry and pour formula into our normal Medela bottles, rather than carry inside the bottles as designed, but we weren't about to buy new bottles as well.
customer_reviews.author: ARobboMK

customer_reviews.title: It does hold 4 scoops great dispensers.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen several negative reviews say you can't fit 4 scoops of formula in container. This is simply not true for me. I have no problems getting 4 scoops of enfamil formula in container. After 3rd scoop simply tap container on counter a few times the formula will settle then the 4th scoop fits very easily inside with a small amount of room to spare. I really like these containers and formula dispenses easily. I can't speak to how they work with the tommee bottles because my daughter prefers different bottles. I simply carry dispensers in a little zipper bag and have had no problem with lids coming off. Dispensers easily dispense formula into my medela bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT hold 8oz/4 scoops of formula
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and function of these, but they DO NOT hold 8oz of formula. I can barely fit 6oz. Other reviewers have said it holds 8oz, but it’s not even close. I use Enfamil formula and I’m pretty sure the scoop size is standard. These only hold 3 scoop (6oz) not 4 scoops (8oz). If you’re looking for a container that holds 8oz this is not the one. Otherwise I really this product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Grace

customer_reviews.title: Love these little things!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little things! Even though it’s more parts to clean, I like these better than the 3 section formula dispensers. Sometimes with those, I see some of the formula mixing with the other department and it makes me nervous. My grandmom will be watching my 3month old when I go back to work and these are way easier for her than the others! I ordered 2 boxes but I plan on ordering more. She only takes 4-6oz do it fits 2-3 scoops but I don’t think it will hold 4 like the description says.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Formula feedings made simpler
customer_reviews.text: These fit my tommee tippee bottles perfectly. They keep the powder dry and ready to use while having the bottle already prepped with the right amount of water. My only criticism is the tips should have used a hinge or something where the top stays attached. I can see myself losing parts later on. Each container is three separate pieces - the cup, the lid, and the cap. To use it, you have to remove the cap only and pour it into the bottle but the lid makes it difficult to get all of the powder out. Granted, it’s a small amount left but it could have been better if the lid and cap where the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rrash

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling/Overnight
customer_reviews.text: These were a lifesaver with my twins! I do recommend tapping the bottom on the counter when filling, after each scoop. This helps the formula settle so you can fit more in there. I could get 3 scoops of Elecare in each container. They were SO EASY to empty into a bottle on the go and prevented spillage. I washed them in my dishwasher, by hand, and put them in my sterilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Twincess Mama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets because they got used so much we lost a couple. These are great, you don’t have to take a giant container of formula when you leave or measure bottles in the middle of the night. These are the best things ever. My daughter now knows the sound of tapping the container to the bottle and get so excited. They really only hold enough formula for six ounces though.
customer_reviews.author: jbeygirls

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to anyone with babies. You put the measurement of formula that you are going to use. Leave it ready for traveling or even at home. This is also good for husband and grandparents that dont know how to exactly measure the exact formula for the water. I always leave the water prepared in the bottle and they add the formula from the tommee tippee dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: ponce

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! They make it so easy to throw a bottle together and toss in the diaper bag. With these, you’ve got your formula and water right there, whenever you need to make a bottle up. The only downside to these is that with the top being in two pieces, it ends up being quite a few small pieces to wash. I just throw them in the bottle basket in the dishwasher, which works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchy B

customer_reviews.title: Great for formula prep
customer_reviews.text: I do not have the Tommee Tippee bottles that these fit into - I simply use them to measure out formula for days out of the house or even middle of the night feeds to save myself the trouble of stumbling around and measuring formula. The funnel is perfect for pouring the formula into my Dr. Brown's original bottles. I've never had an issue with it spilling. They are easy to fill up and clean as well since the lid includes a separate funnel cap. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: These have been a life saver for us... We currently use the tommee tippee bottles but i highly recommend for anyone that doesnt want a bulky container in their bag. I prefill and just grab as needed. Caps are secure fit and have yet to find spilled formula. If you tap after every scoop, you can fit 4 scoops which for us equal 8 oz. And despite the fact that the container is filled to the rim, the caps still snap on tightly. Have repurchased 3x and always include these in gift baskets for expecting parents.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Makes running errands much easier. I buy formula in the biggest bulk can and dragging that in a diaper bag is a pain. These are nice and little can throw a few in they seal up tight and don’t take much room. My experience they fit 2 scoops in each one comfortably 3 would be pushing it. When dispensing though there’s always a little at the end that is a pain to shake out just because of how the hole is in the middle. But otherwise it dispenses nicely.
customer_reviews.author: C Hardy

customer_reviews.title: travel and night time made easy
customer_reviews.text: Already a fan of Tommee Tippee and have used the bottles with both my children. Came across these and they have been a life saver! It's hard enough traveling with a baby so being able to avoid digging through a packed diaper bag is already a plus. But I've also used them for night time feedings. Having the formula proportion already measured out really saves a groggy brain!
customer_reviews.author: Riojas Fam

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen anything like these before so I was so excited to have them! Used them with my first, and now my second. It is so so convenient to take formula around in this and have everything together. Only thing is that they suck to clean and to dry, but its worth it for the convenience of taking a fully packed bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Suthers

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: These work so well when you're going out and about with Tommee Tippee bottles. We learned the hard way that you can't put them in the anti-colic bottles and put the air apparatus in later (all the water leaks out). My little one is almost two months, so we're still doing night feedings. Luckily we've come up with a routine to pre-fill the water in a few bottles, and have these in his room so we can make bottles super fast! It also helps that my little one doesn't mind room temp or cold bottles!
customer_reviews.author: MJMW

customer_reviews.title: not very easy to dispense the powdered formula 😕
customer_reviews.text: great idea but its not very easy to dispense the powdered formula unless you are only using 2 scoops or less 😕 . we use 3 scoops and that pretty much fills the container up so the little spout doesn't allow for the powder to easily pour out 😒, we have to pop off the entire lid to get the powder out.
customer_reviews.author: Trish💗

customer_reviews.title: Just Use Them For Everything!!!
customer_reviews.text: After having a miscarriage I had these laying around and now I pretty much use them every day. Here's just a few of the ways I've been using them so far... Separate Protein powders, pre measured calcium powders, pre measured instant coffee, separate cup of daily vitamins, to hold my jewelry when I'm at the pool, to hold pre measured dipping sauces, for holding gym snacks like almonds...etc. I definitely plan on buying more, love these things how did I like without them???
customer_reviews.author: alp5463

customer_reviews.title: makes traveling easy, only 6 oz bottles possible
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers are handy to have i just wish getting the formula out was easier. I usually take the whole top off instead of just the little lid because it makes pouring the formula into the bottle much quicker, which is a must when you've got a crying, hungry baby waiting on you. I will also say that you can only get a good 6 oz bottle out of these. three scoops of formula and it's full.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hessenauer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for formula fed babies
customer_reviews.text: I have tried them all- and these are the best! They are small, the formula dispenses easily, and they are easy to clean (I put them in the dishwasher!) i use them everyday- not just for traveling. I portion all of my sons formula in the morning so I know it is measured correctly- and to minimize hands in the formula container. This makes bottle making go much quicker- especially when your baby is impatient and HUNGRY!
customer_reviews.author: HonestMama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not use tommie tippie bottles I use Avent but I use these for midnight feedings and for travel. Love them! Very easy to pour and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't spill and worked better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: It's holds four scoops of formula, packed very very tightly. In my experience, the tommee tippee bottle will hold seven ounces of water with this travel formula dispenser in it without spilling. So with the seven ounces of water and four scoops of formula it makes about 8 ounces of formula. During our road trip and traveling, the bottles did not spill at all. It definitely made traveling with a baby easier.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We used these perfect little formula dispensers for traveling and daycare. It was so helpful having a way to pre-measure formula for others, and it made making bottles quick and easy. I highly recommend these. I could even add water to the Tommee Tippee bottle, insert this little formula dispenser and put the lid on and be ready to go. Made it easy to assemble and add formula to already measured water! Making bottles with this was SO EASY! Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and spill proof.
customer_reviews.text: I have used other formula dispensers, and these are by far the best! They never spill or leak, even when rolling around in the diaper bag, and the spout makes pouring into the bottle easy and clean. There are only two negatives, and they're really small. The first is that the top can be difficult to snap on. That's probably one reason it works so well and doesn't spill, so for me it's really minor. The other is that I'd really like the convenience of having something stackable so that it's all together. But that's a personal preference and has nothing to do with the quality of the product. I'd purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: RevRyan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: These things are so convenient. If your baby is formula fed and you go out often, these things are a must have. It would be nice if they were labeled by oz but it's actually pretty easy to tell bey just looking at the volume of powder. Highly recommended for parents on the go. Also, these make night time feedings way easier and less messy. Not sure about most, but I've spilled formula powder all over the place trying to make a bottle for my baby, while being half asleep.
customer_reviews.author: M.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: What a great help. I love that I have bottles ready to go with premeasured formula. I use these on the go in the diaper bag and even at home for night time feedings. It fits inside the bottle and the nipple ring holds it in place with no leakage of water from the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT hold 8 scoops of formula
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT fit 8 scoops of formula, even though I’m sure they meant to write enough for 8oz, it won’t do that either. The idea of these are great, but they do not hold enough. Especially if your baby takes Nutramigen like mine, the scoops are bigger and these won’t even hold 3 scoops of Nutramigen. These worked great while we were only drinking 4oz of formula. Now they are of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold enough formula!
customer_reviews.text: These work great if your baby is only drinking 6 oz or less of formula because even though the product is advertised to hold enough formula to make 8 oz, you can barely close the dispenser if you use more than 3 scoops of formula. Even if you're lucky enough to squeeze 4 scoops of formula into the dispenser, you will not be able to put dispenser back into the bottle if it has 8 oz of water because the water will overflow out of the bottle. So you then have to bring the water along in a separate container. I was so disappointed in this product and decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: TKRon

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many packs of these. I love them so much. They are wonderful for traveling, or just keep prepped at the house. All you to do is grab one and make your bottle. No pulling out the huge dispenser and measuring. These are especially wonderful at night time and make night feed/bottle prep easy. Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Law

customer_reviews.title: My daily use formula dispensers
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these formula dispensers for on-the-go and diaper bag packing; however, they have become a daily-use item because of their ease of use. I fill them all up and I don't have to measure out or refill for two days. They open and close easily and wash well. I only wish they came in a bigger size as my toddler has recently increased his milk intake.
customer_reviews.author: Good Consumer

customer_reviews.title: ... make bottles I decided there had to be a better solution. I loooove these little formula holders
customer_reviews.text: After a long road trip where I had to keep pulling out the formula canister to make bottles I decided there had to be a better solution. I loooove these little formula holders. They are perfect for road trips or even just running errands so I do not have to worry about a made bottle going bad or lugging around a formula canister. We use these every week and have not had a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: Haley B.

customer_reviews.title: Only holds 3-4 scoops of Similac formula powder
customer_reviews.text: 3 scoops of Similac formula powder almost reach the lid. There is no way this small container is going to hold 8 scoops. Very deceptive description. Also it's hard to get all formula powder out as some might stuck around the edge of a lid. and it's hard to remove the very top caps from the lids. They are going to my recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: GTC

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling or for prepping at home
customer_reviews.text: I love these formula dispensers. We actually use advent bottles. We tried the Tommee Tippee ones and my baby just didn't like them. But we got two of these in with our gift set. We loved them so much we bought this pack. The only thing I will say is it does say it holds 8 scoops of formula but that has to be a typo. We put 4 scoops in and they are full to the rim. We fill them up in the evening so they are ready for night when we are half asleep.
customer_reviews.author: BLJ

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it fits in the tommee yippee bottles and saves space but it can get messy when trying to pour formula in a different bottle brand and the pieces are annoying I rarely use them and purchased more easier formula carriers that I really like
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Davis-White aka My Urban Books

customer_reviews.title: Super Useful for Formula Fed Babies
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I don’t use TT bottles, but I love these anyway. They are so useful for tossing in the diaper bag to have pre-measured formula handy if you need to make a bottle on the go. They don’t take up much space, they stay securely closed, and they’re easy to wash and re-use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Turley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little dispensers when we're out for just a couple of hours or less. Perfect for single servings on the go. I have not tried putting the dispenser in the bottle and I have yet to experience powdered formula spilling. I always just put it on the stretchy side pocket of my Skip Hop diaper bag. Not sure if it will fit 4 scoops because with 3 scoops it's close to being full already. I could probably make it work by packing the formula really well.
customer_reviews.author: E. ChampionTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: But it for you baby or protein powder portion storage
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I don't have any children, but this holds fhe exact amount for the one scoop of protein drink powder for my shaker. I don't have to worry it spilling in the gym bag it's just an all around great idea I had for not having to lug the power in ziplock bags or the big jug.
customer_reviews.author: missdee212

customer_reviews.title: Handy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I don't even have the bottles for these, but they are so convenient to have for precisely measured formula ready to go. I use them for when I'm away from home and keep them by my bed at night for quick mixing if my son wakes and needs a feeding. I just bought a Tommee Tippee bottle that I'm going to see if he likes before purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Franks

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nuk Bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are great, especially for late night/early morning feeds! All prepared and ready to go. No fumbling around, measuring water and formula. And the best part is, we use Nuk bottles and it fits perfectly! I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EMJ

customer_reviews.title: So easy and faster
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I have bought in my entire life as a mom it make my life so easy with this I put the powder milk that in need and I just pour it in the bottle and voila ready it’s so easy to use and it’s fast thanks God I have bought this I love it. I always have them prepare the milk and the water and I just mix them any time
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit the anti colic bottles
customer_reviews.text: They don’t fit in the bottles with the little anti colic stick in the middle. I got them so I wouldn’t have to have a big bulky container in my bag so I thought these would be great, they could go in my tomme tippie bottles but they don’t fit with the bottle fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Akass04

customer_reviews.title: Super handy
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So handy! I love that they fit right into the tommee tippee bottles perfectly. Fabulous for on the go or for middle of the night feedings so there is no need to measure or heat. Not sure I could ever do without them now that we’ve switched to formula. Unfortunately now that my baby takes 8oz at a time they do not fit in the 9oz bottle without it overflowing but I still use them to carry the powder for his bottles and with a bit of tapping you can indeed get all 4 scoops of formula in there to make up an 8oz bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: BEST Formula Containers
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best formula containers! They are easy to use, easy to clean and you can actually get all the formula out of them! I love that they nest perfectly inside my TT bottles and don't take up extra valuable space in the diaper bag. We recently used these on an international flight and they were a total lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! They are so easy on the go, rather than having to bring the whole can of formula, you can have everything pre measured and ready to go!! Fits perfectly in our Tommee Tippee and even Nuk simply natural bottles! Every mom I know loves the idea of these and wants them now 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Grimaldi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Much better than the other containers for our tommee tippee bottles. I never have to worry about spilled containers. Reason for 4 stars is because after 5-6 oz of formula the container is full. Any increase in container size there would be an issue with water. So these are only good for 6oz or less of formula.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I would like to say these little containers are great for formula ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to say these little containers are great for formula it's made it easy to feed my baby girl my husband love them when he had to be out with her and my ten-year-old son it made it very easy for him to make her a bottle they're totally worth every penny I will never go back on using the four in one container I feel like that one does not get the full amount of formula you always messing some with this you can take the top off and get everything off at once
customer_reviews.author: Uniquestyles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect for travel, the diaper bag or even just ease at home. They do also fit into he nuk bottles perfectly!! Highly recommend these for any momma, grammy or even to purchase as a baby gift!!
customer_reviews.author: WifeyMommaGrammy

customer_reviews.title: If you use formula GET THESE
customer_reviews.text: These made it super easy to pack bottles for going out and also to prep bottles for over night. They hold about a max of 3 1/2 scoops of formula. I don't use the bottles that go with them, I only use them to hold the formula for quick bottle making.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Good for formula and dry snacks
customer_reviews.text: They can be a little fiddly, but work well so far. Makes it easy to dispense formula, and covers haven’t fallen off. May be too small for certain snacks. You get quite a few in the pack. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These hold 2 scoops of formula per holder comfortably. The tips snap on and off easily, but they don't pop off Ina bids per bag that's often shoved into the stroller or car or thrown around in the house when it's in the way! They wash easily and quickly! We take about 3 on every day trip and it's so easy to get the formal into the bottle without spilling like other formula dispensers.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would fit up to 4 scoops but barly 3 scoops fit inside of this!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for on the go really easy to clean but only thing it only fits 3 scoops of formula well for mine even though the description says up to 8 scoops they should say only 6 oz which would be 3 scoops of formula and it's a tight fit for 3 scoops. My formula scoop is from Similac Advance and I use tommee tippee bottles .
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: Great container to measure out formula for travel
customer_reviews.text: I was searching all over for something to transport formula in so that I didnt have to carry around a large container. I wanted something compact and everything else I could find were the big, bulky multi serve containers and every review said you could not trust the dividers to keep the amounts separated. I love these ones because it makes it so easy. They are easy to clean, and they keep mess to a minimum while out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Great formula holders!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! I kept spilling formula when trying to fill a bottle in the dark in the middle of the night and decided to get single serve formula holders. Best decision I’ve made in awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne H.

customer_reviews.title: No way they hold 8 scoops
customer_reviews.text: These are good and all but it’s deceiving when they say “holds up to 8 scoops of formula” the absolute most I can squeeze in is 3 scoops and it’s to the very top. They’re handy for bottles in the diaper bag but if your little one eats more than 6oz you’re better off getting a divided formula dispenser that just goes in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nuk Simply Natural
customer_reviews.text: LOVE that this fits Nuk Simply Natural bottles. I didn’t like the large three compartment container. I love that I can fill up the bottle with water and then put in the powder storage cups.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Calvert-Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Great until we needed 4 scoops in one
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our dr brown bottles so we could quickly make a bottle. When I bought them I was doing 3 scoops of enfamil and if fit perfectly. But now that she is taking 4 scoops they are constantly overfilled and can barely close the top. I'm not sure how the truly fit 8oz worth of formula. They worked great for a while but now I'll need to find another solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that I was really exited about ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I was really exited about this product, because it says it holds enough to make 8 oz. Unfortunately, it only holds 3 scoops of formula which only makes 6 oz. So keep that detail on mind, because your baby eventually grow up and will need more milk.
customer_reviews.author: Teremy Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: Practical and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. The formula we use doesn't have singles packs. I can't stand dragging the big jar. I've used holder's that have 3 portion slotsand I prefer the singles by far!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Handy for Travel and On-the-Go
customer_reviews.text: I love these dispensers because they empty into any size bottle with ease. I can fit 6-8 scoops of formula in these, and toss into my diaper bag for trips/outings. Not as bulky as other dispensers and I can take more than 3 or 4 bottles' worth of formula (which is what most dispensers hold) if I need to. Only downside is they're a little more time to clean since their are more pieces but not a significant drawback (for me anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great item for transporting formula. These dispensersnare small and oh so convenient! I gave it 4 ⭐ because it claims to hold up to 8 scoops when they can only hold 4 scoops of packed (pushing on it to make it fit) formula which makes 8oz. The claim is misleading eventhough the product is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Star Cash

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves the Tommee Tippee bottles! So I needed these portable, easy travel, convenient formula dispensers. They save space in the diaper bag, and make it very fast and easy to make a bottle when the little one is fussy and hungry. These are perfect! Totally worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick bottle prep
customer_reviews.text: Great for night time bottle and travel ease! Wish they held slightly more though. Says up to 8 scoops, no way! We barely get 3 scoops (6oz bottle worth) into one with tapping and shaking to settle.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers are very nice for travel. The cover securely snaps into place so I didn't have to worry about my milk spilling. It holds about 8 small scoops of milk. I particularly like how the dispenser can fit into the tommee tippee bottle it self. Best used for outings and perhaps for day care.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize how much I needed these!
customer_reviews.text: Our family is always out on the road, visiting our families that live far away so naturally I'm always in the back trying to evenly measure out formula and not spill the entire contents on the can. These work perfectly with Tommee Tippee bottles! I can make bottles easily in the back seat with no more mess! Awesome awesome product and very very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: LuxLe

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these! They are true to word they fit formula for an 8 ounce bottle. You do have to tap it on the counter to get it packed in there. The lids do not easily come over so they do not spill formula everywhere. I love how they easily fit into the bottles so the formula isn’t spilling everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I put one on my night stand at night with 2 scoops of my babies formula in it. And perfect to have ready to go if you have a babysitter or to put in your diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary West

customer_reviews.title: Must haves.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Only 3 scoops maximum fit in each one but it beats having to take the whole can. And they fit perfectly inside the tommee tippee bottles. These are really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Belen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I use these with my Dr. Brown bottles. While I can’t store the container inside the bottle, they are still great!! I use them for every outing in the diaper bag, as well as at night to pre-prepare formula so I’m not waking up the whole house with a hungry baby.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and I even use it to put baby cereal for my daughter goes to her grandmas It’s easier than buying the containers that has 3 compartments because the milk comes out completely
customer_reviews.author: Adrii

customer_reviews.title: Holds 4 scoops max
customer_reviews.text: The lids are kind of a pain to get off, and in other reviews people mentioned they’d been using them upside down because that’s the way they were assembled when item was delivered- I totally see why they thought Thats how you used them. Also, there is no way these hold 8 scoops! Tops would be 4, which makes an 8 oz bottle. So the description is really misleading. All in all though these are really convenient and serve their purpose once you figure them out
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve orders this first time in 2015 for my first baby and now I ordered again for my second that’s how much I like it. It’s very handy and makes making baby bottle very easy and fast. And it’s perfect to use when you’re out inside baby bag
customer_reviews.author: Shaikha

customer_reviews.title: These are a wonderful idea for moms on the run
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful idea for moms on the run. I bought them to mix my vitamins and shakes. I was a tiny bit disappointed that the opening for these little holders is the exact same size as a water bottle. It does NOT get cradled into the mouth of the water bottle. They will not work for what I had in mind. But they are perfect for baby formula or bottles with a wide opening. They are sturdy and they seal perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA

customer_reviews.title: Best dispensers ever
customer_reviews.text: Best dispensers ever, even if you do not own tommee tippee bottles. I use them with my Avent bottles, they are perfect for the nanny, travel, even for putting other things in if you want to. I love that the cap opens easily yet it does not open on it's own when in storage, out and about. Also, the individual casing is a valuable feature as it makes it possible to have them separated or together as you wish. I can easily put 6 spoonfuls, haven't tried more, however you can always put 6, settle it and then put more, I'm sure!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Useful for Mom's who go out with Kids .
customer_reviews.text: I love these Formula Dispensers. Whenever i go out with my kid, i usually take the whole formula box which was very difficult to carry in the diaper bag and when the baby is crying it is very difficult to measure the formula at that moment from the big box . I ordered this product hoping that it would be useful and it turned out to be true. Now, i have to just fill these formula dispensers with the required amount of formula and pack it. Love these small dispensers as it fits perfectly in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great to have!
customer_reviews.text: If you feed your baby with powder formula, this product from Tommee Tippee is a life saver when going away from home. Each dispenser is not big, only holds up to 3 scoops of formula. One dispenser can make 6 oz. baby bottle. I carry formula in these dispensers as well as a few bottles with water. The dispenser fit perfectly in Tommee Tippee bottle. And I use it with other brands of baby bottles too such as Avant, Dr. Brown, and Playtex Vent aire. So far... No mess :)
customer_reviews.author: Mama Pam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for any bottles
customer_reviews.text: I use these with avent bottles and they work like a charm. Easier than the three compartment formula dispensers & all the formula comes out! The only flaw was I recieved one that was semi melted
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great single bottle dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little formula dispensers! They are so easy to use and super convenient. I don't use the tommee tippee bottles so I don't insert them into the actual bottle but they travel well just thrown into the diaper bag. On the description there was something about holding 8 scoops?? Not sure what size scoop they use but each little container holds 3 scoops of the powder we have, which is added to 6oz water to make a 7oz bottle.
customer_reviews.author: thatkellygirl03

customer_reviews.title: Buy some!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Make bottle prep much easier. Although...they say they hold 8 scoops of formula...what kind of formula? It holds 4-6 oz worth of formula powder.
customer_reviews.author: sara

product_meta.title: Tommee Tippee Baby Milk Powder and Formula Dispensers - Travel Storage Container, BPA-Free
product_meta.description: Make preparing baby bottles quick and easy with the Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature Formula Dispenser. The bottle dispenser can hold up to 8 scoops of dry formula so you can make up the bottle as needed and is ideal for use on the go, during overnight hours, and for day care. The formula dispenser conveniently rests inside all Closer to Nature feeding bottles to save space and protect formula. Helping you #ParentOn
feature_bullets: In-bottle Formula Dispensers fit inside a 9 floz bottle to save space for daily trips out of the house and traveling
Measure up to 8 scoops of dry formula in advance, then make the feed as needed
Mixing on demand eliminates the risk of the milk spoiling
Saves time, saves waste, safe and hygienic
Suitable for feeding even the youngest infants and always BPA free and phthalate free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,898 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
